articles.title: California giving $116 million to people who get virus shots - The Associated Press
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — California is giving away the country's largest pot of vaccine prize money — $116.5 million — in an attempt to get millions more inoculated before the most populous state fully reopens next month.
